text:
View this post on Instagram

Went back to the zoo from our first date (yes that's the infamous leopard pen from my Colbert interview). Brought a third wheel this time. We didn't mind.
title: Happy First Time's Father's Day: Celeb Dads Set to Enjoy Special Holiday
